text: Hassan Eklili () (born 1 January 1953) is an Iranian comedian, actor and producer. He was born in Isfahan, Iran. Which has played many works that are mostly in the city of Isfahan. He became famous by playing in the series Mr. Caught and then increased his popularity by playing in the series Hasht Behesht. ==References== * Category:Actors from Isfahan Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian movie producers
title: Hassan Eklili
